role.argrole: entity arg0 causes to be on the watch list

example.parse: (IP (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 国民党) ) (VP (VV 赞成) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 限制) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (ADVP (AD 曾)) (VP (VP (VE 有) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (JJ 组织)) (NP (NN 犯罪) ))) (CC 和) (VP (SB 被) (CP-OBJ (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 一清) (NN 专案) ) (VP(VV 列管) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)))))))))) (NP (NN 者) )) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 参选) (NP-OBJ (NN 公职) )))))))
